title: Senior C++ RAN Engineer
description: Design and optimize 5G RAN controllers written in modern C++17. Work with STL/Boost, Kubernetes deployments, Redis caching layers, and GTest.

title: Real-Time Systems Developer
description: Implement low-latency telecom services for state/fault management. Requires deep Linux debugging, Docker/Helm pipelines, and telecom domain knowledge.

title: 5G Core Software Engineer
description: Build high-availability services in C++ for 5G core orchestration, integrating with Kubernetes, OpenStack, and CI using Git/Perforce.
